body.name: Bakken- Swiss 2-Piece Mini Nonstick Egg Pan & Omelet Pan – Egg Pan [5.5''] with Copper/Golden Non-Stick, Skillet, Eco-Friendly –for Eggs Pancakes, for All Stoves - Non Toxic

features: MADE FOR CONVENIENCE: Designed specifically for those who need a compact and efficient pan, our 2-piece set is perfect for whipping up quick breakfasts and snacks. No matter your cooking skills, this set will match all your expectations–easy to store, and convenient when you need to cook smaller portions.

A TIMELESS BASIC: In this set, you’ll find a 5.5’’ pan that is made for egg enthusiasts. With its heat-resistant kitchen spatula, you have in your hands the essentials you need to make this timeless dish. Whether it's a sunny-side-up morning or a scrambled brunch, you get to enjoy the classic, humble egg easily.

COMFORT IN ALL SITUATIONS: Our pans have comfortable cool-touch, form-fitting handle grips. This way, no risk of burning your hand anymore! And as comfort is not limited to cooking only, our products are stain-resistant and their surface is easy to clean. Keep in mind that, even though they are built to last, we recommend washing them by hand, as the dishwasher may impact their quality.

REMARKABLE MATERIALS: Made with reinforced pressed aluminum metal and engineered nylon, our pans are durable. With a coating thickness of 20-25 um and a multi-layered construction of 3.0mm, they ensure even heat distribution and retention. From gas to electric and ceramic counter cooktops, our pans are versatile and will adjust to every kitchen.

SAFE & SUSTAINABLE: At Bakken-swiss, our customers’ health is a priority, as well as our impact on the environment–our pans are food-grade safe, and eco-friendly. With a maximum temperature resistance of 392° Fahrenheit (200° Celsius), our pans ensure that every meal is cooked to perfection without any harmful chemicals.
body.description: The Bakken-Swiss 2-piece mini pan set is your answer to quick and easy cooking, especially when you’re craving that perfect egg for breakfast. The copper non-stick surface is part of this set’s outstanding quality and also ensures health-conscious cooking with fewer oils. Designed for durability, this pan promises even heat distribution, so your meals are cooked just right every time. Coming with the 5.5'' pan, the nylon utensil is part of the kitchen essentials you need at all times. The comfortable cool-touch handle grip provides a burn-free and secure grip–flip, turn, and sauté with confidence! When it comes to cleaning the dishes, who enjoys spending more time cleaning than cooking? The stain-resistant feature combined with an easy-to-clean surface makes maintenance almost effortless. At Bakken-Swiss, our priority is to make your cooking experience enjoyable and safe. Discover the difference–secure your set in your cart now!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 15, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Good for making eggs
reviews.reviewText: Crafted with precision and featuring a copper/golden non-stick surface, these eco-friendly pans bring style and efficiency to any kitchen.Mini Nonstick Pans: This set includes two perfectly sized pans – an egg pan with a diameter of 5.5 inches and an omelet pan – making them ideal for preparing individual servings of eggs, pancakes, or omelets. I can enjoy precision cooking for my favorite breakfast treats.Copper/Golden Non-Stick Surface: The pans feature a copper/golden non-stick coating that ensures easy release of food and effortless cleaning. Experience the joy of cooking without the hassle of stubborn residues sticking to the pan.Skillet Design: The skillets are expertly designed to distribute heat evenly, promoting consistent cooking results. Achieve perfectly cooked eggs or pancakes with each use, thanks to the reliable heat conductivity of these pans.Eco-Friendly Construction: Crafted with eco-consciousness in mind, the Bakken-Swiss pans are made with materials that prioritize sustainability. Enjoy guilt-free cooking with pans that align with environmental values.For All Stoves: These versatile pans are suitable for use on all types of stovetops, including gas, electric, ceramic, and induction cooktops. Adapt to any kitchen setup effortlessly.Non-Toxic Materials: The Bakken-Swiss pans are crafted with non-toxic materials, ensuring that food remains safe and free from harmful substances. I can cook with confidence, knowing that this cookware prioritizes my well-being.Stylish Aesthetics: The copper/golden finish adds a touch of elegance to your kitchen, elevating the visual appeal of the cookware. These pans not only perform exceptionally but also look stunning in any kitchen setting.These pans are so easy to make my eggs in. The non stick finish helps my eggs not get stuck to the pan and these are so easy to clean.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 4, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect pan for 1 egg
reviews.reviewText: This pan is perfect for 1 egg at a time, easy to clean, light weight and very durable.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewText: I love this pan and use it for almost everything. I was looking for a small pan to replace the one that I had, and this pan is far superior. Because it is small, it is extremely easy to clean. The coating on the pan is something I have never experienced before. I would highly recommend it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 20, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I love how sturdy this pan feels. It has a nonstick surface and cleans easily. I accidentally got some of my egg on the side and was worried it would ruin the pan but I was able to wash it thoroughly and it washed off so it still looks brand new. The spatula also feels thick, sturdy, and a quality item. The price for both is amazing. Overall it’s a beautiful pan and I love it’s ease of use. Best small egg pan I’ve bought! I recommend it! Great customer service as I went to register it as well :)

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 7, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars La peor inversión
reviews.reviewText: Demasiado pequeña ,nada que ver con la descripción

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 9, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Incredible mini pan!
reviews.reviewText: The Bakken 5.5 inch egg pan and spatula are a fantastic duo. They both are well made, it is not a flimsy aluminum pan like some brands sell and the spatula is equally sturdy. I washed and oiled the pan then let it sit for one hour prior to using. Before cooking I added a bit more oil. The pan accommodates one extra large egg and an extra large egg white. I mixed the egg in a bowl then poured it into the pan because trying to mix it in the pan would be tight. The heat distribution is great and the scrambled eggs cooked quickly and evenly with low flame on a gas stove, with no hot spots. Nothing stuck to the pan and cleaning was a breeze. I highly recommend this pan and will buy more of their cookware. Five stars!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 31, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect size for an egg sandwich. Well made
reviews.reviewText: This little skillet is just what I needed for one egg. It is well made and the little spatula that was included is perfect for whatever you want to use it for.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 27, 2023
reviews.reviewText: We wanted to make cute Santa pancake and these tiny pan was perfect for weight and size for the little hands.It heat up quickly and the handle was not heated and nicely gripped so the little hands can hold the pan steadyIt was also easy to clean and scrubbed after use and even the little chef cleaned up his own tools. The only thing is we needed the smaller size specular
